fields.text: Thank you for calling Redpoint Ventures in San Francisco, where we invest in people.
To speak with our investment team, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to your partner representative.
Please hold while we connect you to our investment team.
For information about Redpoint Ventures, press [INDEX].
To learn about our portfolio companies, press [INDEX].
Please hold for our portfolio highlights.
For press and media inquiries, press [INDEX].
Please hold for our media relations department.
